column4: Hi, I'm about to install the latest Ubuntu as a virtual machine on my 64 bit windows 7 computer. Should I install the 64-bit or 32-bit version of Ubuntu? Is 64-bit as stable as 32? I'm just looking for what would be fastest and most stable.
no need for 64 in vm only if you can give more then 3GB ram to vm
but I have more than 3gb available for the vm :)
